actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that no individual who served in any armed force shall be denied veterans benefits unless that individual was discharged or released from active service with a dishonorable discharge.

summary.text: Defines the term "veteran" so as to provide that no individual who served in any armed force shall be denied veterans benefits or released from active service with a dishonorable discharge. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 101 (2)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that no individual who served in any armed force shall be denied veterans benefits unless that individual was discharged or released from active service with a dishonorable discharge.
